snippet.title: Nikki’s Tour of Swapdoodle For Nintendo 3DS
snippet.description:
The Swapdoodle™ game is an easy way to write messages, draw 3D pictures, and share them with your Nintendo 3DS friends. Swapping doodles is a snap thanks to stamps based on the icons of played titles and your Mii™ character. You can also purchase in-game add-ons packs that have doodle lessons of Nintendo characters!

#Swapdoodle #Nintendo #3DS

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com
